subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Florida Derby (Horse Race)
Horses
lead_paragraph: Eddie Plesa Jr., a little-known trainer, has a leading Kentucky Derby contender in Itsmyluckyday, a slight 2-1 favorite to win the Florida Derby.
snippet: Eddie Plesa Jr., a little-known trainer, has a leading Kentucky Derby contender in Itsmyluckyday, a slight 2-1 favorite to win the Florida Derby.
